title: Manchester City v Bournemouth: Premier League – live
summary: Michael Butler provides a minute-by-minute report as two teams with strong attacking players compete at the Etihad Stadium. Fans can expect an exciting match filled with action. Stay tuned for updates on the game's progress.

title: India v South Africa: Women’s Cricket World Cup final – live
summary: An over-by-over report is underway to determine the new champion in the tournament. The writers are closely following the match to provide updates. The excitement builds as fans anticipate whose name will be engraved on the trophy.

title: Celtic v Rangers: Scottish League Cup semi-final – live
summary: A minute-by-minute report details the competition between the struggling Old Firm teams as they vie for a spot in the final. Billy Munday provides live updates and insights on the match. Fans can follow along to see which team prevails in this critical showdown.

title: Peter Watkins obituary
summary: The pioneer of docudrama, whose notable 1965 film "The War Game" was deemed "too horrifying" for BBC broadcast, has passed away. The film, which depicted the aftermath of a nuclear attack, received critical acclaim despite its controversial nature. His work significantly influenced the genre and highlighted the stark realities of war.

title: West Ham 3-1 Newcastle: Premier League – live reaction
summary: Nuno Espírito Santo secured his first victory as West Ham manager with a strong performance against Newcastle. The match highlighted West Ham's resurgence, while Newcastle struggled to find their form. This win marks a positive step forward for Santo's tenure.
